H0.text: Lee Kuan Yew and Goh Chok Tong were the first two Prime Ministers of which country. Malaysia

H1.text: Lee Kuan Yew and Goh Chok Tong were the first two Prime Ministers of which country. Brunei

H2.text: Lee Kuan Yew and Goh Chok Tong were the first two Prime Ministers of which country. Thailand

H3.text: Lee Kuan Yew and Goh Chok Tong were the first two Prime Ministers of which country. 新加坡

A4.text: In 1990, Goh Chok Tong succeeded Lee and became Singapore's second prime minister.

A5.text: Former prime ministers of Singapore, Lee Kuan Yew and Goh Chok Tong, have stated that Singapore does not fit the traditional description of a nation.
